div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 896 Pirgovo, c. 15 km. S of Ruse, Bulgaria, 1961 Burial: c. 125 B.C. (Price) Contents: 17+ AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 9 late post. tetradr. (Me- sembria) Macedonia, 1st Region: 8 tetradr. Disposition: Ruse Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 263
